showProgress.description: Display a bar indicating progress as fraction of completed tasks
showProgress.title: showProgress

showSubmitButton.description: Show the button to submit the HIT
showSubmitButton.title: showSubmitButton

additionalProperties.description: One of the supported task specs

userTasks.description: Allow the user to create tasks from the given map of id => task_spec
userTasks.title: userTasks

canMute.description: User is able to mute the video
canMute.title: canMute

fps.description:
Frames per second of the video file.
Some tasks use it to collect data once per frame.
fps.title: fps

muted.description: Video should be played without audio
muted.title: muted

speed.description:
Speed of the video in multiples of real time (1x)
0 will allow the user to change speed (starting at 1x)
speed.title: speed

CheckboxGroupSpec.title: CheckboxGroupSpec

prerequisite.description:
Task is marked as a prerrequisite
Prerrequisite tasks must be completed before the rests of the tasks in the HIT are revealed.
prerequisite.title: prerequisite

required.description: If true, this task must have a valid submission before the HIT can be submitted
required.title: required

maxTime.description: Max time (in seconds) the user may take to complete the task
maxTime.title: maxTime

useRequestAnimationFrame.description:
Uses requestAnimationFrame as trigger for data reads.
requestAnimationFrame normally fires at close to 60Hz
Setting to true can improve the quality for lower framerate media by capturing data points between frames.
If enabled, data annotations may not align with media frame times.
useRequestAnimationFrame.title: useRequestAnimationFrame

autoSubmit.title: autoSubmit

toggle-occluded.title: toggle-occluded

condition.title: condition

input.description: input props for a single input element
input.title: input

checkedChildren.description: The text to be shown when the state is checked
checkedChildren.title: checkedChildren

unCheckedChildren.description: The text to be shown when the state is unchecked
unCheckedChildren.title: unCheckedChildren

allowClear.description: Whether to allow clear when click again
allowClear.title: allowClear

character.description: Custom character to use in place of star
character.title: character

autoClearSearchValue.description: Whether the current search will be cleared on selecting an item. Only applies when mode is set to multiple or tags
autoClearSearchValue.title: autoClearSearchValue

defaultActiveFirstOption.description: Whether active first option by default
defaultActiveFirstOption.title: defaultActiveFirstOption

filterOption.description: If true, filter options by input
filterOption.title: filterOption

labelInValue.description: Whether to embed label in value, turn the format of value from string to { value: string, label: ReactNode }
labelInValue.title: labelInValue

maxTagCount.description: Max tag count to show. responsive will cost render performance
maxTagCount.title: maxTagCount

maxTagTextLength.description: Max tag text length to show
maxTagTextLength.title: maxTagTextLength

optionFilterProp.description: Which prop value of option will be used for filter if filterOption is true. If options is set, it should be set to label
optionFilterProp.title: optionFilterProp

optionLabelProp.description: Which prop value of option will render as content of select
optionLabelProp.title: optionLabelProp

showArrow.description: Whether to show the drop-down arrow
showArrow.title: showArrow

showSearch.description: Whether show search input in single mode
showSearch.title: showSearch

tokenSeparators.description: Separator used to tokenize on tag and multiple mode
tokenSeparators.title: tokenSeparators

virtual.description: Disable virtual scroll when set to false
virtual.title: virtual

label.description:
Label for the field.
Usually displayed next to or on top of the field.
label.title: label

name.description:
Name of the field.
The results will refer to the field by this name.
name.title: name

required.description: If true the field will be required to be filled before submission.
required.title: required

tooltip.description: Text for a tooltip with more information
tooltip.title: tooltip

jump_speed.description: Initial speed when a key is pressed

repeat.description: number of copies or instances of the HIT
repeat.title: repeat

tasks.description: list of tasks in the HIT

hasFlow.description:
If true, the video file is assumed to include an optical flow video stacked horizontally, such that:
- the left half of the video contains the video to be displayed
- the right half of the video contains the optical flow video (hidden)

Shuffler.description:
The Shuffler defines a block of tasks that will be shuffled internally by covfee when a new HIT instance is created.
This is a recursive interface, to support recursive shuffling by embedding Shufflers within Shufflers.
Note that *tasks* should be an array of arrays of tasks (or Shufflers), and not simply an array of tasks.
Shuffler.title: Shuffler

dots.description: Whether the thumb can drag over tick only
dots.title: dots

included.description: Make effect when marks not null, true means containment and false means coordinative
included.title: included

max.description: The maximum value the slider can slide to
max.title: max

min.description: The minimum value the slider can slide to
min.title: min

step.description: The granularity the slider can step through values. Must greater than 0, and be divided by (max - min) . When marks no null, step can be null
step.title: step

tooltipVisible.description: If true, Tooltip will show always, or it will not show anyway, even if dragging or hovering
tooltipVisible.title: tooltipVisible

vertical.description: If true, the slider will be vertical
vertical.title: vertical
